versos: (arrayed) Revelation 19:8 - "It was granted her to clothe herself with fine linen, bright and pure for the fine linen is the righteous deeds of the saints.";;;
(infinite) Psalm 147:5 - "Great is our Lord and mighty in power; his understanding has no limit.";;;
(chain) Genesis 42:24 - "He turned away from them and began to weep, but then came back and spoke to them again. He had Simeon taken from them and bound before their eyes.";;;
(ride) Habakkuk 3:8 - "Did the Lord rage against the rivers Or was Your anger against the rivers, or Your wrath against the sea, that You rode on Your horses, Your chariots of salvation";;;

(chariot) 2 Kings 9:21 - "And Joram said, Make ready. And his chariot was made ready. And Joram king of Israel and Ahaziah king of Judah went out, each in his chariot, and they went out against Jehu and met him in the portion of Naboth the Jezreelite.";;;
(knee) Romans 14:11 - "It is written: 'As surely as I live,' says the Lord, 'every knee will bow before me; every tongue will acknowledge God.'";;;
(ruler) Romans 13:1 - "Let every person be subject to the governing authorities. For there is no authority except from God, and those that exist have been instituted by God.";;;
(manasseh) 2 Chronicles 26:9 - And Uzziah built towers in Jerusalem at the Corner Gate and at the Valley Gate and at the Angle

(dearth) Ezekiel 14:13 - "Son of man, when a land sins against me by acting faithlessly, and I stretch out my hand against it and break its supply of bread and send famine upon it, and cut off from it man and beast,";;;
(buy) "And those who were to be numbered of them were threescore and four thousand and three hundred." - Numbers 1:46;;;
(mischief) Psalm 94:20 - "Shall the throne of iniquity have fellowship with thee, which frameth mischief by a law";;;
(befall) Job 5:15 - "But he saves the needy from the sword of their mouth, from the clutches of the powerful.";;;
(governor) Acts 23:24 - "Provide mounts for Paul so that he may be taken safely to governor Felix.";;;
(roughly) Sorry, but there is no Bible verse that includes the word "roughly.";;;
(spies) Numbers 13:16 - "These are the names of the men Moses sent to spy out the land.";;;
(youngest) Genesis 43:33 - "The men had been seated before him in the order of their ages, from the firstborn to the youngest; and they looked at each other in amazement.";;;
(stream) Ezekiel 32:6 - "I will drench the land with your flowing blood all the way to the mountains, and the ravines will be filled with your flesh.";;;
(anguish) Psalm 25:17 - "Relieve the troubles of my heart and free me from my anguish.";;;
